title: OCE Trans Girls Unite :D
body:
Hello friends c:
I'm creating this discussion to find out if their are other active trans girls on the server, especially from my area! We could add each other and play some games together :)
A little about me:
I'm 23 and from Melbourne Australia, I main mid and support, and my favourite champions are {{champion:103}} , {{champion:412}} , and {{champion:89}} ! I started playing ranked recently and am currently Silver IV, trying to climb up to Gold.

<3 Millie

replies.body: Why would you put this on boards?

For the reasons I stated in the post.
Why ask me this and not the trolls?

Because trolls are expected, this just feeds them.

And seriously, does it matter what Gender identity someone has?

You shouldn't be looking for some race/gender/other modifier, you should be looking for decent people.

I'm not going to avoid posting because trolls may find some entertainment in replying to it. I'm not at fault here.
I'm happy to add and play with people of any gender identity if they're nice, but as a trans person I know how great it can be to be friends with people who understand what you're going through, so I created this discussion as a means to reach out to others.

>but as a trans person I know how great it can be to be friends with people who understand what you're going through

I hate to say this, but this is the wrong place for it.

I'd love for the internet to be all good about shit like this, but sadly it's not, and honestly, how much do you communicate to people on league?

Honestly these are the sort of people your looking for in real life, not online (or at the very least, not on an online gaming board.)
add me :) finally someone out there who can relate :). how big is your dong?
Get out pls

Trans is short for Transgender.
It means someone that was assigned a certain gender at birth, but now lives as a different one.
For me it means I was assigned male at birth but I identify as female.
its not like the doctors choose your gender for you, so its not really assigned. it's more along the lines of do you have a weiner or not.

That's... not true.
There are a whole variety of (not uncommon!) situations where someone is neither phenotypically male, nor female.

When one says 'assigned [x] at birth', that's pretty much what happened.  A doctor looked at the baby and said "It looks like it has a vagina, I think it's a girl", or "That looks pretty ambiguous, let's do some surgery" or something.

And even people who were 'assigned' male at birth can have the secondary sex characteristics of a 'typical female' - grow breasts naturally, for example.

[Here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Intersex#Conditions) is a list of a few conditions like that, to get you started.

> [{quoted}](name=Homura Akemi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Pfh6EuK8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-13T04:54:41.977+0000)
>
> add me :) finally someone out there who can relate :). how big is your dong?

Lol.
I am thinking of transitioning into a man can I still join u as a friend??? :(
i support u bb

OCE board is currently for the most part, lifeless.

You have come here at a wrong time, should have posted this on the original forum.

The current forum community is rather small, and how many of those are transgender in the first place, not to mention that's if they are willing to come out. So I would guess this unite thread really wouldn't end up well.

GL though.
I've told you before Sekai hun, the boards are only as lifeless as you make them. Post as much as you did on the forums and they will come.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Pfh6EuK8,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2015-04-13T09:14:17.228+0000)
>
> I've told you before Sekai hun, the boards are only as lifeless as you make them. Post as much as you did on the forums and they will come.

I was the "comment guy" who fed on existing posts.

But since OCE Board is generally not updating all that much so I have already started more threads than I did before. Well that's I guess an upside of the current OCE board, I make more threads now.

Honestly you aren't going to get much in the way of positive responses here.
The OCE forums are rarely open minded and anyone claiming to be a girl (let alone anything outside the "normal") gets abused quite a fair bit.

Not to mention most transgirls (at least the ones I've been friends with or dated) are rather introverted and hide. I've only known one transgirl who has been outspoken about who she is, and that's because her sheer size is intimidating for anyone under 6'7" height.
Even if they don't respond in thread, some people may see it and add her.

I did expect hostility, but figured I'd make the post anyway in case there are any people that wanted to reply seriously.
I'd never find out if I didn't ask, right? :)
Well you've gotten more negative responses than positive. I don't think it was worth. But if you can handle the shit storm, have at it.

yes add me I am a trans grill
Yes I am a girl
Yes i play video games
Don't hit on me silly boys
xoxo
pics or you arent trans
you'd be better off making a post on reddit where they'll circlejerk over you.
because you're the outsider.

I was born a man but for a long time have identified as a woman identifying as a man. I'm going to take the brave step of cutting out the middle woman and just identifying as a man.

godspeed my friend.
No.

Never seen a trans person irl before, it would be interesting to see what being the other sex is like but I mean if your just dressing as a girl your still technically male aren't you? I mean unless you got your DNA and sexual organs modified somehow it's technically impossible to change sexes. Not saying it's wrong to want to be the other sex but technically speaking at least physically it is impossible.
post on the NA forums or reddit, americans love this weird "progressive" shit
This ain't /b/ stop acting like it is.
Think she picked trans ;).
yes i am a grill
most thai people I know play DotA.
